content: pumpkin in turn from divide sts evenly across 3 needles and/or start the magic the base and up through the stem loop when you feel comfortable make a hanging loop at the top by round 2 knit folding the top 20cm green yarn in round 3 increase 1 into each st across 16 sts half and knotting it at the end now round 4 purl this ridge forms the top of the stem decide where on the string you knit 4 rounds would like them to hang then make round 9 k2tog k6 twice 14 sts a knot below each pumpkin this will knit 3 rounds help them to stay put and not move round 13 k2tog k5 twice 12 sts around rounds 14 and alternate rounds knit round 15 k2tog k4 twice 10 sts round 17 k2tog k3 twice 8 sts round 19 k2tog k2 twice 6 sts round 21 k2tog k1 twice 4 sts round 22 knit fasten_off thread yarn through remaining sts from end to beginning of round and pull up tight medium and small stem worked top down using green cast on 2 sts round 1 work as for large stem knit 2 rounds round 4 purl this ridge forms the top of the stem knit 4 rounds share pics of your pumpkins round 9 k2tog k2 twice 6 sts www ravelry com/patterns/library/ round 10 knit www ravelry com/designers/just-jen | justjen-designs@outlook com © jenny newman 2021 updated 2024 all rights reserved
